long_description: The REI Thermo Earband combines 2 high-performance fleeces to keep your ears warm, dry and safe from chilling wind. Upper earband features Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) check-pattern fleece; its wind-resistant, water-repellent and breathable nature will keep you warm and dry. Drop-down earband uses a lighter weight Wind Pro microfleece that is also wind resistant and breathable; fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent to shed rain and snow. Polartec Wind Pro fleece offers 4 times the wind protection of traditional fleece without compromising breathability. Lycra(R) spandex binding and shaping ensure a flexible, secure fit.
